Author: snefferu
Text: Same, I was so gung ho the first month or so... feeling hesitant now I’m close-ish to penultimate target and I don’t look like sickly death anymore. Ana brain keeps telling me we’re already chubby smh.

Author: bollarcones
Text: I've never been in treatment, but when I was trying to go from 89lbs to about 95lbs, I got stuck around 90-92 for the longest time. It was strange. I was definitely eating a surplus of calories, but my weight wouldn't budge - I even whooshed a couple times and dropped back down to 89. I freaked out and thought I broke my metabolism and started binging to gain weight. It worked in the end, but I regret it now - you should definitely take it slow to make sure the weight gain is healthy. I'm sure the target goal may seem arbitrary, but I'd trust the professionals haha
